title: Moon landing in Exeter Cathedral.
desc: This is my description of the movie The Last of the Mohicans
aiSummary: The Museum of the Moon is an art installation by Luke Jerram that is coming to Exeter Cathedral this month. It is a seven-meter model of the moon that uses precise lunar imagery from NASA. The installation is enhanced by a surround-sound composition created by BAFTA and Ivor Novello Award-winning composer, Dan Jones.
strings: Bristol-based artist, Luke Jerram, is known world-wide for his large-scale artworks...
...capturing the public imagination with his ground-breaking combination of art,
